content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one historical development illustrated by the passage. b) Describe Blanchefort’s argument regarding war against the Protestants.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
